channel.title: Leonardo Foo's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Leonardo Foo's Blog

item.title: AI Blog Assistant
item.description: An AI-powered assistant to help manage and enhance personal blogs.

item.title: Welcome to My Bilingual Blog
item.description: Announcing the new bilingual feature of this blog.

item.title: ğŸš€ 5 New Interactive Features Added to This Blog!
item.description: I’ve just added 5 powerful new interactive features to complement the existing easter eggs: real-time search, reading progress indicator, copy-to-clipboard code blocks, smooth theme transitions, and back-to-top button!

item.title: ğŸ® New Interactive Features: Easter Egg Hunt!
item.description: Discover the hidden interactive features I’ve added to this blog - including the classic Konami Code easter egg, Matrix rain animation, and random tech quotes!

item.title: Getting Started with Machine Learning: A Beginner's Guide
item.description: An introductory guide to machine learning concepts, covering the basics of supervised learning, popular algorithms, and practical tips for beginners.

item.title: Building a Hugo Blog: Lessons Learned
item.description: My experience setting up this Hugo blog with the PaperMod theme, including challenges faced, solutions found, and tips for other developers.

item.title: Top 5 Programming Tools That Changed My Workflow
item.description: A curated list of development tools that significantly improved my productivity and coding experience, with practical tips on how to use them effectively.

item.title: Quick Note: Setting Up Python Virtual Environments
item.description: A quick reference guide for creating and managing Python virtual environments using venv, including common commands and best practices.
